Name: Add To Admin Group
Description: Prompts for user to add to adminstrator group

Name: Systems Up
Description: Pings a list of systems defined in Systems-Up/systems.conf

Name: Active Users
Description: Queries active users on systems defined in Users-Active/systmes.conf

Name: Encrypted Drives
Description: Queries bitlocker state on systems defined in Drives-Encrypted/systems.conf
